document_data.name: Hawk's Nest
document_data.mainbody: '''Hawk's Nest''' was a small watchtower near the top of the [[Silverymoon Pass]].
document_data.Geography: Travelers on the [[Silverymoon Pass road|road]] from [[Silverymoon]] to [[Sundabar]] were often pressed hard to reach the shelter of the watchtower before nightfall.
document_data.Defense: The watchtower was usually manned by a dozen [[Knights in Silver]] during the months when the Silverymoon Pass was in heavy use.
